long_description: Lightweight and compact, the REI RFID Passport shield combats potential ID theft by keeping personal information private. It blocks access to personal data stored on passport micro chips. Tear- and water-resistant laminated foil sleeve helps block unauthorized scanning of the RFID (radio frequency identification) chip found inside your passport.
short_description: Lightweight and compact, the REI RFID Passport shield combats potential ID theft by keeping personal information private. It blocks access to personal data stored on passport micro chips.
